TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_kli', title = kli', year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/kli'} }

S.FORM: Kli' ru Zkli' (ke' na Plmukan: 老虎 ) ga qutux qsinu, ana ga, kli' ga maniq hi' squliq. ungat hazi' kli' nya' te hlahuy misu qani la.
Kli' ro Zkli' (ke' na Plmokan: 老虎 ) ga qotox qsino, ana ga, kli' ga maniq hi' sqoliq. ongat hazi' kli' nya' te hlahoy miso qani la.
